summary.purpose: Firebase Firestore type definitions for real-time collection subscriptions, document listeners, snapshot configurations, and query conditions.
summary.problem_solved: Provides type-safe interfaces for snapshot listeners, parser callbacks, query conditions, and configuration objects to ensure consistent real-time data handling.

external.why_used: Provides Unsubscribe function type and WhereFilterOp operator types.
external.name: firebase/firestore

external.why_used: Provides TObject type for generic object typing.
external.name: akeyless-types-commons

exports.name: OnSnapshotParsers
exports.description_one_line: Collection of optional snapshot event callbacks.

exports.name: WhereCondition
exports.description_one_line: Query condition with field, operator, and value.

exports.name: Snapshot
exports.description_one_line: Function type for collection snapshot subscriptions.

exports.name: SnapshotDocument
exports.description_one_line: Function type for document snapshot subscriptions.

symbols.name: OnSnapshotCallback
symbols.description_one_line: Snapshot event callback with documents and config.

details.what_it_does: Callback function signature receiving document array and OnSnapshotConfig for handling snapshot changes.
details.type_definition: type OnSnapshotCallback = (documents: any[], config: OnSnapshotConfig) => void;

symbols.name: OnSnapshotParsers
symbols.description_one_line: Optional event handlers for snapshot changes.

details.what_it_does: Interface with optional callbacks: onFirstTime (initial data), onAdd (new documents), onModify (updated), onRemove (deleted). Used to handle different types of Firestore collection changes.
Defines a WHERE clause with field_name, Firestore operator (==, !=, <, >, <=, >=, array-contains, in), and comparison value.
Extends OnSnapshotParsers with collectionName, optional extraParsers array, WHERE conditions, ORDER BY specs, cache/db source, and result format (object/array).
Like OnSnapshotConfig but for single document: collectionName, documentId, no onAdd, optional conditions, and extraParsers.
Returns promise (resolves after initial load) and unsubscribe function to stop listening.
Function signature: (config, snapshotsFirstTime array, optional settings) => SnapshotResult.
details.type_definition: type Snapshot = (config: OnSnapshotConfig, snapshotsFirstTime: string[], settings?: { disableLogs?: boolean }) => SnapshotResult;

details.what_it_does: Function signature: (config, snapshotsFirstTime array) => SnapshotResult for single document listening.
details.type_definition: type SnapshotDocument = (config: OnSnapshotConfigDocument, snapshotsFirstTime: string[]) => SnapshotResult;
